subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Mohammad Aamer, the Pakistan cricketer who some think may be the best 18-year-old bowler the game has ever seen, has registered for a course in accounting to prepare for a life after cricket.
snippet: Mohammad Aamer, the Pakistan cricketer who some think may be the best 18-year-old bowler the game has ever seen, has registered for a course in accounting to prepare for a life after cricket.
